question: I am going to list some different political and social actions that people can take. Have you done this ...  d. posted your own thoughts or comments on political or social issues ONLINE
options: Have done in the past year
Have done in the more distant past
Have not done, but might do
Have not done and would never do
raw_output:
I chose option A because I have actively shared my opinions on political or social issues through online comments within the past year, reflecting recent engagement. 

ANSWER: A
